title: Ticket #6390: Fix build without openssl
description: There are issues when building without openssl. This attached series of patches corrects this.
remarks:
2019-May-13 17:00:57 by tim:
In the development series, we added a hard requirement to use OpenSSL for cryptographically secure random numbers. So, we will abandon this ticket.
attachments:
• 0001-condor_ft-gahp-fix-build-without-openssl.patch 1456 bytes added by quintinhill on 2017-Aug-30 14:00:06 UTC.
  • 0002-condor_io-fix-build-without-openssl.patch 1721 bytes added by quintinhill on 2017-Aug-30 14:00:16 UTC.
  • 0003-condor_submit-fix-build-without-openssl.patch 1053 bytes added by quintinhill on 2017-Aug-30 14:00:24 UTC.
  • 0001-condor_shadow-use-zkm_base64_encode.patch 977 bytes added by quintinhill on 2018-Apr-09 11:54:38 UTC.
    A further patch is now required.
